    • Constructor Detail

      • LinkResolver

        public LinkResolver(String originalURL)
        Raw string input of the URL. If the URL is invalid, the response code that is returned will indicate such.
        Parameters:
        originalURL - The URL you wish to unwind represented as a string.

        Get the link details
        Returns:
        Detailed log of every redirection that took place with the browser along with it it's ultimate status code.

      • normalizeURL

        public static String normalizeURL(String url)
        Removes the protocol, if it exists, from the front and removes any random encoding characters Extend this to do other url cleaning/pre-processing
        Parameters:
        url - - The String URL to normalize
        Returns:
        normalizedUrl - The String URL that has no junk or surprises

      • tokenizeURL

        public static List<String> tokenizeURL(String url)
        Goal is to get the different parts of the URL path. This can be used in a classifier to help us determine if we are working with

        Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10046178/pattern-matching-for-url-classification

        Parameters:
        url - - Url to be tokenized
        Returns:
        tokens - A String array of all the tokens
